about_the_game:
Retro-style Pirate MMORPG with large focus on community and PvP

Free-to-play forever!



  • Become a Sailor in a harsh sea of thieves and heroes!
    Start off as a sailor and choose to join the Navy or become a Pirate! Become scum of the sea, or become a hero in the eyes of the law. Things aren't black and white in the world of Pirate Souls.



  • Open World PvP & Hardcore Game Design
    This may be a turn off for some, but Pirate Souls is a very hardcore game. So take this as a word of warning... Absolute freedom when it comes to PvP also means a bad time for some with a low tolerance for being killed for no reason. But for others, it's just another reason to get stronger!



  • Deep Character Customization in the right places
    Choose your faction, join a crew and obtain a soul fruit power. Combined with thousands of equip-able items, no two seafarers will ever look or be the same. Pirate Souls is a game where you are encouraged to express yourself. Looking good doesn't cost you to lose fights.

short_description: A 2D Online RPG where you can become the most wanted pirate, the strongest bounty hunter or even the highest-ranking Marine! Customize your character to be uniquely yours, level up and find treasures. Start your adventure in the world of Pirate Souls now!
